mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS device_log ( id CHAR(50), product_key CHAR(50), device_name CHAR(50), type CHAR(50), identifier VARCHAR(255), content VARCHAR(1024), code INT, ts DATETIME, report_time DATETIME, device_key CHAR(50) )
mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'device_log'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_log (id, product_key, device_name, type, identifier, content, code, ts, report_time, device_key) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productKey}, #{deviceName}, #{type}, #{identifier}, #{content}, #{code}, NOW(), #{reportTime}, #{deviceKey} )
